fields.Title of Presentation: Teaching qualitative research methods online with NVivo
fields.Description/Abstract:
This presentation was part of a webinar panel discussion on: Teaching Qualitative Research Methods Online

Panel members:  Christina Silver, Ph.D., Founder of Qualitative Data Analysis Services Ltd and Research Fellow at the University of Surrey and Sarah L Bulloch, Ph.D. Teaching Fellow, The CAQDAS Networking Project, Department of Sociology, University of Surrey and Chareen Snelson, Ed.D., Associate Professor, Boise State University, Department of Educational Technology. The panel will discuss best practices and engagement strategies for teaching students online.
